website_summaries.verdict: This classic rain barrel may look somewhat basic, but it offers capacity and features that make it a practical choice.
pros: Made of recycled plastic which appeals to eco-conscious shoppers
Cover fits well and keeps out bugs and debris
cons: Finish is prone to developing scratches, plus some barrels have been reported to arrive scratched

customer_reviews.title: Best Choice
customer_reviews.text: I looked at a lot of different rain barrels on Amazon before deciding on this one, and it was a perfect choice, Unlike many others in the same price range, these have fittings pre-installed and a screen in the lid to filter out leaves. No extra work or fittings were required. There is no better choice IMO.
customer_reviews.author: Mike K

customer_reviews.title: Great for water backup during drought conditions.
customer_reviews.text: These are sturdy food grade barrels. The top cover is retro-fitted with a screen to keep out debris. You can also fit a small bucket because of the wide mouth opening. There are 3 interchangable ports for chain connecting barrels, and a bottom spigot, with a valve to attach a hose. All ports will fit a standard hose. These are great for watering the garden. I currently have town water and it smells like pool water, coming out of the tap; so this is a good alternative.
customer_reviews.author: A. Wilkins

customer_reviews.title: Rain Barrel Number 3
customer_reviews.text: This is the third one of these that I have purchased.
customer_reviews.author: Donald Lewin Nelson

customer_reviews.title: Just One Flaw
customer_reviews.text: The barrel is very durable and has just one flaw that I can see. The overflow valve is angled upward in such a way as to guarantee kinking any hose you attach to it. I'm thinking that I will use some PVC fittings to replace the hose option.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Actually excited for it to rain!
customer_reviews.text: Got this barrel delivered yesterday and installed in a fairly short amount of time. It’s a great barrel and I’m actually excited for rain to come. One small complaint is the sturdiness if the top overflow valve. The bottom valve might be the same way but that’s not as important to me. When I connected a hose to the overflow valve, the hose pulled down on the valve and moved it considerably making me think that the valve won’t last very long. Otherwise, I’m really pleased with it.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen S.

customer_reviews.title: Great, for the most part
customer_reviews.text: This barrel is sturdy, doesn't leak, has a screen to catch debris (and maybe prevent mosquitoes?), was easy to set up. The one thing I'm not happy about is that the top overflow valve doesn't seem to work well. I've got a garden hose attached to the top overflow valve so I can divert excess water, but the water doesn't flow out of the hose unless I jiggle the hose a while - not practical during a heavy rain or thunderstorm. So I'm getting overflow water around my foundation during a heavy rain- not what I want.
customer_reviews.author: SuzieQ

customer_reviews.title: Slow shipping
customer_reviews.text: Received it today after three wrong tracking numbers. The condition was not like the picture. It was scratched all along the bottom and gauges all over it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Barrel!
customer_reviews.text: Great rain barrel and does what it supposed to do... collect rain water! I do wish it had another spout half way down so I could get more gravity fed flow with a hose attached. The barrel is not that high up (so it will fit the existing downspout) and it could use the extra help! Otherwise, great purchase.
customer_reviews.author: fotostuf

customer_reviews.title: Rain Barrel from yattaskin
customer_reviews.text: We received our Rain Barrel from Yattaskin which we ordered thru Amazon. It’s scratched and has black oily spots on it. I am wondering if it was used before we received it as a new product. It wasn’t exactly cheap $87.- I know it’s plastic but still not ok.
customer_reviews.author: Esther

customer_reviews.title: Leaks at spigot
customer_reviews.text: Barrel starting leaking after about 2 months. Manufacturer did contact me and provided shipping label to return. No credit yet, but 5 stars on standing behind the product.
customer_reviews.author: Sandy Weber

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what i wanted top comes off for easy cleaning.i will add snother one next year
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice rain barrel. Works perfectly!
customer_reviews.text: I like the size shape and color of this rain barrel. I placed it next to my covered patio where have an odd location for the downspout. I'm able to catch the rainwater coming off of that downspout and use for plants or drain it away with a hose. Very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Debi

customer_reviews.title: Greenhouse
customer_reviews.text: Great product just what I need for my greenhouse just the rite amount of water wish I had done this before a superior product
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Aesthetically not perfect but well designed.
customer_reviews.text: Design wise, love this rain barrel. Aesthetically, prospective buyers need to realize that the original use for these barrels was in the foodservice so they are a little scuffed up.
customer_reviews.author: Emm Bee

customer_reviews.title: Multi-use rain barrel. Love it!
customer_reviews.text: We put this in our greenhouse to sustain heat. Thermal Mass but inexpensive and easy to use. Once full we use it as a table with a piece of shelf on top. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: NANA

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Arrived as described in great time. So far so good.
customer_reviews.author: JO

customer_reviews.title: Great construction
customer_reviews.text: Really like the barrel. Came as pictured and is very "rock solid". Had a different type of barrel (flat back, rounded front) that split along the seams. This barrel has a better construction and seems like it's really going to last.
customer_reviews.author: Xena

customer_reviews.title: Great at collecting a lot of rain water
customer_reviews.text: Great at collecting a lot of rain water. My plants have been enjoying the water in our dry drought area. I liked it so much that I bought two!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Rain Barrell
customer_reviews.text: We recently had our rain barrel installed. We have enjoyed using the collected water for watering our plants. The barrel is indeed recycled.
customer_reviews.author: Donna Fulghum

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Rain Barrels
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what we ordered. I would recommend to others and so excited to put them into full use this summer. Great customer service the barrels went to the wrong address but they fixed it with no fuss. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Angel

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and practical.
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful and practical. We have been using these since July with no problem whatsoever. A great deal (and they arrived quickly).
customer_reviews.author: Diana

customer_reviews.title: great product!
customer_reviews.text: I first bought 2, then I went for the third one. It does what its suppose to and I am very happy with this product. the rain water I collect I use for my garden all summer long! very happy with this product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Rain barrell
customer_reviews.text: Easy to set up, and it didn't take long to fill with our El Nino this winter. We use the water for our plants not covered by our sprinkler system, and for inside for flushing the toilet when the water gets turned off.
customer_reviews.author: M. Ruth

customer_reviews.title: Great price it and great seller!
customer_reviews.text: The rain barrel is great and exactly as described. I love all of the hose connections. Very durable material. Great seller. Will definitely buy from them again!
customer_reviews.author: tony Randolph

customer_reviews.title: Worth it
customer_reviews.text: Had a little glitch package was damaged mid transmid spoke with the company they were great to deal with good product
customer_reviews.author: Amber k

customer_reviews.title: Great solid barrels that work very well at catching rain
customer_reviews.text: I bought three and like them so much I may buy a couple more for the garden in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Happy Crazy Cap owner

customer_reviews.title: Great barrel. Helps us handle our drought conditions.
customer_reviews.text: Really like this barrel. It has a screw-off lid, which most don't have. It was easy to set up and has been working flawlessly - now we just need some RAIN. We are in a big drought, and this barrel, along with 2 others we have, help us get through the dry times between infrequent rains. We use the water for garden plants and 2 horses.
customer_reviews.author: Dawn Altman

customer_reviews.title: I recieved a very scratched used rain barrel. Talked ...
customer_reviews.text: I recieved a very scratched used rain barrel. Talked to company who gave me a little money off. Barrel fills quickly on one rainy night. I'm working on finding the right soaker hose. The hose I purchased does not drip water. Still a project in action.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren Howroyd

customer_reviews.title: Ready to use and look good...and no delivery charge. Delivered 4 of them right to the door!
customer_reviews.text: We purchased 4 of these and we loved that they were ready to use. We didn’t have to put in spigots or do any drilling or cutting. They were all ready to use!
customer_reviews.author: toooff10

customer_reviews.title: A Good Buy
customer_reviews.text: Fabulous! I am saving so much water - and very easily. It looks great too!
customer_reviews.author: Mystery Girl

customer_reviews.title: Damaged, scratched, dirty out of the box...
customer_reviews.text: Seems like a decent product, however arrived scratched and damaged out of the box.
customer_reviews.author: Carlos

customer_reviews.title: Three of my four barrels smell like olives. Also
customer_reviews.text: The barrels are recycled and I don't think the description made that clear. Three of my four barrels smell like olives. Also, I have had some leakage as recently as yesterday. I set them up about a month ago, so it mystifies me that now I have a leak out of the top side overflow hose connector. Besides some leaks that are fixed and/or need to be fixed, they seem to be a good product.
customer_reviews.author: linda

product_meta.title: Upcycle 55 Gallon Gray Rain Barrel
product_meta.description: Gray 55 gallon rain Barrel made from high-density polyethylene (HDPE). rain barrels are containers that collect and store rainwater draining from your roof. They have many economical and sustainable advantages. Many communities force "odd-even" or inch no watering" bands to conserve water resources, which makes collecting your own more beneficial. It provides an ample supply of free inch soft water" that contains no chlorine, Lime or calcium for gardens, flower pots, and car and window washing. Reconditioned rain barrels are made from recycled & reconditioned plastic barrels formerly used for food product shipping, such as pickle and pepper barrels. Barrels are modified into rain barrels and assembled with a Spigot & overflow fitting. The rain Barrel top/lid is equipped with metal mesh screen to filter out debris and prevent mosquitoes from getting in.
